See how graphic design students look at the world at Viewmaster Madness a graphic design show that will begin Sept PERIOD  and continue through Sept PERIOD  in Mariposa Hall 4000E PERIOD

The show will display  students work through ViewMaster viewers the classic 3D slide show toy PERIOD

As part of an assignment students were to capture how they perceive this life in three dimension PERIOD

The students explored different ways of showing their views of the  world said Professor Gwen Amos graphic design PERIOD They liked the fact that the ViewMaster format was unique. the artists took their own pictures cut their own film and put the  pictures in reels PERIOD Students were so fascinated by the assignment that  they wanted to put on a show PERIOD

A reception for Viewmaster Madness will be held Thursday from  p.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD Artists will be present to discuss their work PERIOD

Many students took the assignment very seriously and made a personal statement through their work Amos said PERIOD Others just had fun at it. cancel reply
